title: Why would I feel sick after being adjusted by a chiropractor?
description: Answer (1 of 5): Feeling sick after an adjustment is a rare occurrence in my opinion. However, feeling dizzy is more common. Adjustments particularly to the neck and upper neck may effect the vestibular and propioceptive systems. Your body gets used to the position of the bones and what is moving...
